remarks: The set of trace-preserving endomorphisms on the set of translations for a fiducial co-atom ` W ` .  (Contributed by NM, 8-Jun-2013.)
statement:
tendoset.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
tendoset.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
tendoset.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
tendoset.r $e |- R = ( ( trL ` K ) ` W ) $.
tendoset.e $e |- E = ( ( TEndo ` K ) ` W ) $.
tendoset $p |- ( ( K e. V /\ W e. H ) -> E = { s | ( s : T --> T /\ A. f e. T A. g e. T ( s ` ( f o. g ) ) = ( ( s ` f ) o. ( s ` g ) ) /\ A. f e. T ( R ` ( s ` f ) ) .<_ ( R ` f ) ) } ) $.
$d K f g s $.
$d T f g s $.
$d W f g s $.
